summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Lakeside Avenue, from East James Street to the north line of Yesler Way, produced east; Erie Avenue, from East Jefferson Street to East Alder Street; Randolph Avenue, from East James to East Alder Street; East Terrace Street, from Lakeside Avenue to the west line of Yesler's Third Addition to the City of Seattle; East Jefferson Street, from Lakeside Avenue to Randolph Avenue; East James Street, from Lakeside Avenue to Wellington Avenue; Wellington Avenue, from East James Street to Randolph Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 447 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
